snippet: For the third snowstorm of his young administration, Mayor Bill de Blasio said he had implemented some changes to speed the city’s response.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, grappling with the third snowstorm of his administration, says he has already learned from his mistakes and has made changes to speed snow removal; although the weather has been challenging, it has also let de Blasio portray himself as an everyman, repeatedly photographed shoveling snow outside his home in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: For the third snowstorm of his young administration, Mayor Bill de Blasio said he had implemented some changes to speed the city’s response.

headline.main: De Blasio Says New York Learned From Past Storm Mistakes
headline.print_headline: Mayor Says City Learned From Past Storm Mistakes
